entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Clearing this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this morning. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
